description:

Luke fucks like a maching, grabbing Wolfie and flipping him over, rocking his world missionary before letting Wolfie ride him to submission, before pulling out and blasting Wolfie right in the face with his hot, pent up load. Just what he needed!

Enjoy!
title: Massage Call
